External Resources

Contractors

AB Tech regularly works with these local vendors. If AB Tech is unavailable to support your event, we may refer you to one of these vendors.

Vincent Lighting Systems (VLS) Lighting, media, & staging
Hughie's Event Production Services Lighting, media, sound reinforcement, & staging
Flyspace Productions Outdoor staging
4Wall Lighting
Hollowood Music & Sound Backline & Sound reinforcement
